name: Nzscrollfullscreen
tagline: Full screen view while scrolling UIView.
body:
### NZScrollFullScreen
Hide Status Bar + Navigation Bar and Tab Bar while scrolling.

### In Action:
![Action Full Screen](http://lh3.googleusercontent.com/-9Iac7wR99P0/VGGDtKXQCmI/AAAAAAAACzI/RB5oCIb2dho/w305-h549-no/NZFull.gif)
note: Don't delete this file! It's used internally to help with page regeneration.
